title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13ยง 13.2 - Registration of commodity broker-dealers, salespersons and investment advisors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13ยง 13.2 - Registration of commodity broker-dealers, salespersons and investment advisors

State Regulations
(a) In compliance with subdivision 14 of section
359-e
of the

General Business Law, all commodity broker-dealers shall file form CBD with the Department of Law. All commodity salespersons shall file form CM-2
with the Department of Law. All commodity investment advisors shall file form CADV with the Department of Law. Any person who manages or supervises
any such commodity broker-dealer, salesperson or investment advisor shall supply the information set forth and required on forms CBD and CADV. All
officers, directors, principals, partners, managers, supervisors and 10 percent or more equity holders of commodity broker-dealers and commodity
investment advisors shall file form CI-1 with the Department of Law. Each of the above forms shall be subscribed and sworn to by the signer thereof
and notarized. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. &
Regs. Tit. 13ยง
13.2

Amended

New York State Register July 3, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 27, eff. 7/3/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
